resources.string: How to use the Subway System in São Paulo
5 tips to you learn how to use the subway in São Paulo
TIP NUMBER 1:\n ALWAYS LET THE LADDER\'S LEFT SIDE FREE!
TIP NUMBER 2:\n DON\'T LISTEN TO MUSIC WITHOUT EARPHONES!
TIP NUMBER 3:\n OFFER YOUR SEAT FOR WHO ELSE NEED IT MORE!
TIP NUMBER 4:\n ALWAYS HAVE A EXTRA TICKET OR CARD!
TIP NUMBER 5:\n DOWNLOAD THE METRO\'S APP!
